Wolaitta Sentences: Paaquhi GODAA sinttan iitabaa oottiis; Nabaaxa na7ai Iyorbbaami Israa7eela asaa ootissido nagaraa oottiyoogaa aggibeenna.

English Sentences: In the days of Pekah king of Israel came Tiglathpileser king of Assyria, and took Ijon, and Abelbethmaachah, and Janoah, and Kedesh, and Hazor, and Gilead, and Galilee, all the land of Naphtali, and carried them captive to Assyria.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela Kawuwaa Paaquha wodiyan Asoore Kawoi Tigilaati-Paleseeri yiidi Iyoona, Aabeeli-Beetimaa7ika, Yaanooha, Qedeeshanne Haxoora geetettiya katamata olidi oiqqiis; qassikka Gala7aade, Galiilanne Nifttaaleema biittata ubbaa olidi, asaa Asoore biitti omooddidi efiis.

English Sentences: And Hoshea the son of Elah made a conspiracy against Pekah the son of Remaliah, and smote him, and slew him, and reigned in his stead, in the twentieth year of Jotham the son of Uzziah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ooziyaana na7ai Yo7aataami kawotido laatamantta laittan, Eela na7ai Hoshee7i Ramaaliyaa na7aa Paaquha bolli maqettidi woriis; woridi a sohuwan bau kawotiis.

English Sentences: And the rest of the acts of Pekah, and all that he did, behold, they are written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Paaquhi hanido harabainne i oottidobai ubbai Israa7eela Kawotu Taarikiyaa Maxaafan xaafetti uttiis.

English Sentences: In the second year of Pekah the son of Remaliah king of Israel began Jotham the son of Uzziah king of Judah to reign.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ramaaliyaa na7ai, Israa7eela Kawoi Paaquhi kawotido naa77antto laittan, Yihudaa Kawuwaa Ooziyaana na7ai Yo7aataami kawotiis.

English Sentences: Five and twenty years old was he when he began to reign, and he reigned sixteen years in Jerusalem. And his mother's name was Jerusha, the daughter of Zadok.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yo7aataami kawotiyo wode ayyo laittai laatamanne ichchasha; i Yerusalaamen tammanne usuppun laitta kawotiis. A aayee sunttai Yaruusho; Yaruusha Xaadooqa na7iyo.

English Sentences: And he did that which was right in the sight of the LORD: he did according to all that his father Uzziah had done.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba aawai Ooziyaani oottidoogaadan, Yo7aataamikka GODAA sinttan suurebaa oottiis.

English Sentences: Howbeit the high places were not removed: the people sacrificed and burned incense still in the high places. He built the higher gate of the house of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gidikkonne asai goinniyo xoqqa sohota xaissibeenna; he sohotun yarshshuwaa yarshshiyoogaanne ixaanaa cuwayiyoogaa aggibeenna. Yo7aataami Beeta Maqidasiyaa geliyo qommo bagga penggiyaa zaarettidi oottiis.

English Sentences: Now the rest of the acts of Jotham, and all that he did, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Judah?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yo7aataami hanido harabainne i oottidobai ubbai Yihudaa Kawotu Taarikiyaa Maxaafan xaafetti uttiis.

English Sentences: In those days the LORD began to send against Judah Rezin the king of Syria, and Pekah the son of Remaliah.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wodiyan GODAI Sooriyaa Kawuwaa Raaxiinanne Ramaaliyaa na7aa, Israa7eela Kawuwaa Paaquha Yihudaa biittaa olissanau doommiis.

English Sentences: And Jotham slept with his fathers, and was buried with his fathers in the city of David his father: and Ahaz his son reigned in his stead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yo7aataami haiqqidi, ba maizzan gaittiis; ba maizza aawaa Daawita Kataman ba maizza aawatuura moogettiis. A sohuwan a na7ai Akaazi kawotiis.

English Sentences: In the seventeenth year of Pekah the son of Remaliah Ahaz the son of Jotham king of Judah began to reign.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ramaaliyaa na7ai Paaquhi kawotido tammanne laappuntta laittan, Yo7aataama na7ai Akaazi Yihudan kawotiis.

English Sentences: Twenty years old was Ahaz when he began to reign, and reigned sixteen years in Jerusalem, and did not that which was right in the sight of the LORD his God, like David his father.
Wolaitta Sentences: I kawotiyo wode laittai ayyo laatama; Yerusalaamen i tammanne usuppun laitta kawotiis. A maizza aawai Daawiti suurebaa oottidoogaadan, GODAA ba Xoossaa sinttan i suurebaa oottibeenna.

English Sentences: But he walked in the way of the kings of Israel, yea, and made his son to pass through the fire, according to the abominations of the heathen, whom the LORD cast out from before the children of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: I kase de7ida Israa7eela kawotu ogiyan hemettiis. Qassi GODAI Israa7eela asaa sinttappe laaggidi kessido asatu de7uwaa wogaa, he sheneyiyaagaa qullidi, ba yelido na7aa addaa taman xuuggidi, eeqau yarshshiis.

English Sentences: And he sacrificed and burnt incense in the high places, and on the hills, and under every green tree.
Wolaitta Sentences: Akaazi asai goinniyo xoqqa sohotun, keratu huuphiyaaninne daashsha mitta ubbaa garssan yarshshuwaa yarshshiisinne ixaanaa cuwayiis.

English Sentences: Then Rezin king of Syria and Pekah son of Remaliah king of Israel came up to Jerusalem to war: and they besieged Ahaz, but could not overcome him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Sooriyaa Kawoi Raaxiininne Ramaaliyaa na7ai, Israa7eela Kawoi Paaquhi Yerusalaame olanau yiidosona. Yiidi dooddidosona; shin Akaaza xoonanau danddayibookkona.

English Sentences: At that time Rezin king of Syria recovered Elath to Syria, and drave the Jews from Elath: and the Syrians came to Elath, and dwelt there unto this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode Sooriyaa Kawoi Raaxiini Eelaata giyo katamaa zaaridi ekkidi, Yihudaa asaa laaggidi kessiis. Yaatin Eedooma asati Eelaata katamaa yiidi, hachchi gakkanaashin yan de7oosona.

English Sentences: So Ahaz sent messengers to Tiglathpileser king of Assyria, saying, I am thy servant and thy son: come up, and save me out of the hand of the king of Syria, and out of the hand of the king of Israel, which rise up against me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Akaazi Asoore Kawuwaa Tigilaati-Paleseerassi kiitaa yeddidi, "Taani ne na7anne ne ashkkara. Hayyanaa haaya; yaada tana oliya Sooriyaa kawuwaa kushiyaappenne Israa7eela kawuwaa kushiyaappe tana ashsha" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Ahaz took the silver and gold that was found in the house of the LORD, and in the treasures of the king's house, and sent it for a present to the king of Assyria.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Akaazi GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaaninne kawo keettaa buquraa minjjiyoosan de7iya biraanne worqqaa ekkidi, Asoore kawuwaayyo imo oottidi yeddiis.

English Sentences: And the king of Assyria hearkened unto him: for the king of Assyria went up against Damascus, and took it, and carried the people of it captive to Kir, and slew Rezin.
Wolaitta Sentences: Akaazi giidoogaa Asoore kawoi maayidi, Damasqqo katamaa olidi oiqqiis. Oiqqidi asaa omooddidi, Qiira giyo sohuwaa efiis; Kawuwaa Raaxiinakka woriis.

English Sentences: And king Ahaz went to Damascus to meet Tiglathpileser king of Assyria, and saw an altar that was at Damascus: and king Ahaz sent to Urijah the priest the fashion of the altar, and the pattern of it, according to all the workmanship thereof.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Kawoi Akaazi Asoore Kawuwaa Tigilaati-Paleseeraara gaittanau Damasqqo biis. Biidi Damasqqon de7iya yarshshiyoosaa be7iis; be7idi a milatiya yarshshiyoosaa keexxana mala, he yarshshiyoosaa misiliyaanne keexxiyo hanotaa qeesiyaa Ooriyoonayyo kiittiis.

English Sentences: And Urijah the priest built an altar according to all that king Ahaz had sent from Damascus: so Urijah the priest made it against king Ahaz came from Damascus.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Kawoi Akaazi Damasqqoppe simmidi yaanaashin, qeesiyaa Ooriyooni he leemisuwaa milatiya yarshshiyoosaa giigissiis.

English Sentences: And when the king was come from Damascus, the king saw the altar: and the king approached to the altar, and offered thereon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Damasqqoppe simmido wode, yarshshiyoosai oosettidi polettidoogaa be7iis. Be7idi yarshshiyoosaakko shiiqidi,

English Sentences: And he burnt his burnt offering and his meat offering, and poured his drink offering, and sprinkled the blood of his peace offerings, upon the altar.
Wolaitta Sentences: ba xuuggiyo yarshshuwaanne ba kattaa yarshshuwaa yarshshiis. Qassi ba ushshaa yarshshuwaa gussiis; ba issippetettaa yarshshuwaa suuttaakka yarshshiyoosaa bolli caccafiis.

English Sentences: And he brought also the brasen altar, which was before the LORD, from the forefront of the house, from between the altar and the house of the LORD, and put it on the north side of the altar.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nahaasiyaa giyo birataappe oottidi, GODAAYYO dummayi wottido yarshshiyoosai ooratta yarshshiyoosaappenne Beeta Maqidasiyaappe gidduwan de7ees. Yaatin Akaazi he gal77a yarshshiyoosaa denttidi, ba ootissido ooratta yarshshiyoosaappe huuphessa baggaara wottiis.

English Sentences: And king Ahaz commanded Urijah the priest, saying, Upon the great altar burn the morning burnt offering, and the evening meat offering, and the king's burnt sacrifice, and his meat offering, with the burnt offering of all the people of the land, and their meat offering, and their drink offerings; and sprinkle upon it all the blood of the burnt offering, and all the blood of the sacrifice: and the brasen altar shall be for me to enquire by.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Kawoi Akaazi qeesiyaa Ooriyoona hagaadan yaagidi azaziis; "Ha wogga ooratta yarshshiyoosaa maallado xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa, omarssi shiishshiyo kattaa yarshshuwaa, kawoi shiishshiyo xuuggiyo yarshshuwaanne kattaa yarshshuwaa, asai ubbai shiishshiyo xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa, eta kattaa yarshshuwaanne eta ushshaa yarshshuwaa yarshshiyoosaa ootta. Hankko nahaasiyaappe oosettida yarshshiyoosaa taani tau oichchiyo soho kessana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Thus did Urijah the priest, according to all that king Ahaz commanded.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Ooriyooni Kawoi Akaazi azazidoogaadan oottiis.

English Sentences: And king Ahaz cut off the borders of the bases, and removed the laver from off them; and took down the sea from off the brasen oxen that were under it, and put it upon a pavement of stones.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Akaazi Beeta Maqidasiyaa giddon go7ettiyo, nahaase birataappe oosettida gaaretu lochcha birata qanxxidi, miyyiyaappe diggiis; diggidi meecettiyo kereta gaaretu bollaappe denttiis. Qassi Abba Sainiyaa, a zemppissida nahaase booratu misiletu bollappe denttidi, shuchchaa baasuwaa bolli wottiis.

English Sentences: And the covert for the sabbath that they had built in the house, and the king's entry without, turned he from the house of the LORD for the king of Assyria.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asoore kawuwaa gishshau, Akaazi ba kawotaa araataa kase wottiyo sohuwaappe diggiis. Qassi appe kase de7ida kawoti GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaa geliyo penggiyaa gorddiis.

English Sentences: Now the rest of the acts of Ahaz which he did, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Judah?
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Akaazi hanido harabainne i oottidobai ubbai Yihudaa Kawotu Taarikiyaa Maxaafan xaafetti uttiis.

English Sentences: And Ahaz slept with his fathers, and was buried with his fathers in the city of David: and Hezekiah his son reigned in his stead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Akaazi haiqqidi, ba maizzan gaittiis; Daawita Kataman ba maizza aawatuura moogettiis. A sohuwan a na7ai Hizqqiyaasi kawotiis.

English Sentences: In the twelfth year of Ahaz king of Judah began Hoshea the son of Elah to reign in Samaria over Israel nine years.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa Kawoi Akaazi kawotido tammanne naa77antto laittan, Eela na7ai Hoshee7i Israa7eela bolli Samaariyaa kataman kawotiis; i uddufun laitta kawotiis.

English Sentences: And he did that which was evil in the sight of the LORD, but not as the kings of Israel that were before him.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA sinttan i iitabaa oottiis; gidikkonne appe kase de7ida Israa7eela kawoti oottidoogaa keesa iitaa oottibeenna.

English Sentences: Against him came up Shalmaneser king of Assyria; and Hoshea became his servant, and gave him presents.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asoore Kawoi SHalmman77eeseri yiidi, aara olaa gaittiis; gaittin Hoshee7i xoonettidi, ayyo giiraa giiriis.

English Sentences: And the king of Assyria found conspiracy in Hoshea: for he had sent messengers to So king of Egypt, and brought no present to the king of Assyria, as he had done year by year: therefore the king of Assyria shut him up, and bound him in prison.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin amarida laittaappe simmin, Kawoi Hoshee7i Soo7a giyo Gibxxe kawuwaassi kiitaa yeddidi, bana maaddana mala oichchiis. Yaatidi kaseegaadan Asoore kawuwaassi giiriyoogaa aggi bayiis. Kawoi SHalmman77eeseri hegaa siyidi, a oittidi, qasho keettaa gelissiis.

English Sentences: Then the king of Assyria came up throughout all the land, and went up to Samaria, and besieged it three years.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Asoore kawoi Israa7eela biittaa ubbaa bolli woraajjidi, Samaariyaa katamaa dooddiis; dooddidi heezzu laitta gattiis.

English Sentences: In the ninth year of Hoshea the king of Assyria took Samaria, and carried Israel away into Assyria, and placed them in Halah and in Habor by the river of Gozan, and in the cities of the Medes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hoshee7i kawotido uddufuntta laittan Asoore kawoi Samaariyaa katamaa omooddiis. Omooddidi Israa7eela asaa ekkidi, Asoore biitti efiis. Efiidi eta attaa Halaaha kataman, attaa Meedoonatu katamatun, haraata qassi Gozaana biittan de7iya Haboora SHaafaa matan wottiis.

English Sentences: For so it was, that the children of Israel had sinned against the LORD their God, which had brought them up out of the land of Egypt, from under the hand of Pharaoh king of Egypt, and had feared other gods,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagee ubbai hanidoogee, Israa7eela asai GODAA bantta Xoossaa bolli, eta Gibxxeppe, Gibxxe kawuwaa kushiyaappe kessidaagaa bolli nagaraa oottido daafaana. Qassi eti hara xoossatussi goinnidi,

English Sentences: And walked in the statutes of the heathen, whom the LORD cast out from before the children of Israel, and of the kings of Israel, which they had made.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI eta sinttappe laaggidi kessido dere asati de7ido de7uwaa wogaa kaallido daafaana. Hegaa bollikka qassi Israa7eela kawoti doommido iita wogaa kaallido daafaana.

English Sentences: And the children of Israel did secretly those things that were not right against the LORD their God, and they built them high places in all their cities, from the tower of the watchmen to the fenced city.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asai GODAA bantta Xoossaa bolli iitabaa geeman oottidosona; qii guutta moottaappe biidi, wogga gita katamaa gakkanaassi de7iya sohotun ubban banttau goinniyo xoqqa sohota medhdhidosona.

English Sentences: And they set them up images and groves in every high hill, and under every green tree:
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi eti eeqa shuchchatanne Asheero giyo xoossaa misileta keraa huuphe ubbaaninne daashsha mitta ubbaa garssan essidosona.

English Sentences: And there they burnt incense in all the high places, as did the heathen whom the LORD carried away before them; and wrought wicked things to provoke the LORD to anger:
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka eti GODAI beni eta sinttappe laaggidi kessido dere asati oottidoogaadan, xoqqa soho ubban ixaanaa cuwayidosona. Eti GODAA hanqqetissiya iitabaa oottidosona.

English Sentences: For they served idols, whereof the LORD had said unto them, Ye shall not do this thing.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI eta, "Eeqau goinnoppite" gi wottidaashin, eti eeqau goinnidosona.

English Sentences: Yet the LORD testified against Israel, and against Judah, by all the prophets, and by all the seers, saying, Turn ye from your evil ways, and keep my commandments and my statutes, according to all the law which I commanded your fathers, and which I sent to you by my servants the prophets.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Israa7eela asaanne Yihudaa asaa ba hananabaa yootiya ubbatu baggaaranne ajjuutan be7iya ubbatu baggaara, "Inttena erite! Intte iita ogiyaappe simmite; taani hananabaa yootiya ta ashkkaratu baggaara, intte aawati azazettanaadan immido higgiyan de7iya wogaanne awaajuwaa ubbaa naagite" yaagi wottiis.

English Sentences: Notwithstanding they would not hear, but hardened their necks, like to the neck of their fathers, that did not believe in the LORD their God.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin eti siyennan ixxidosona. GODAA bantta Xoossaa ammanettibeenna bantta aawatudan morggiyaa zozzissidosona.

English Sentences: And they rejected his statutes, and his covenant that he made with their fathers, and his testimonies which he testified against them; and they followed vanity, and became vain, and went after the heathen that were round about them, concerning whom the LORD had charged them, that they should not do like them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti a wogaa, i eta aawatuura maacettido maachchaanne a seeraa karidosona. Eti shufuro eeqatau goinnidi, bantta huuphiyaukka shufuro gididosona. GODAI eta, "Intte yuushuwan de7iya dere asati oottiyoogaadan oottoppite" gi wottidaashin ixxidi, eti eta de7uwaa wogaa kaallidosona.

English Sentences: And they left all the commandments of the LORD their God, and made them molten images, even two calves, and made a grove, and worshipped all the host of heaven, and served Baal.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA bantta Xoossaa azazuwaa ubbaa aggiigidosona. Aggiigidi mara milatiya, naa77u goinniyo misiletanne Asheero giyo xoossee misiliyaa medhdhidosona. Saluwan de7iya xoolintte ubbaassi goinnidosonanne Ba7aala giyo eeqaassi oottidosona.

English Sentences: And they caused their sons and their daughters to pass through the fire, and used divination and enchantments, and sold themselves to do evil in the sight of the LORD, to provoke him to anger.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bantta attuma naatanne macca naata taman xuuggidi yarshshidosona. Kaayiyoogaanne moitilliyaa haasayissiyoogaa meezetidosona. Hegaadan iitabaa oottanau bantta huuphiyaa baizzidi, GODAA hanqqetissidosona.

English Sentences: Therefore the LORD was very angry with Israel, and removed them out of his sight: there was none left but the tribe of Judah only.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, GODAI Israa7eela asaa keehippe hanqqettiis; hanqqettidi eta ba sinttappe diggiis. Diggin Yihudaa zariyaa xalaalai attiis.

English Sentences: Also Judah kept not the commandments of the LORD their God, but walked in the statutes of Israel which they made.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yihudaa asatikka GODAA bantta Xoossaa azazuwaa naagibookkona; eti Israa7eela asai doommido de7uwaa wogaa kaallidosona.

English Sentences: And the LORD rejected all the seed of Israel, and afflicted them, and delivered them into the hand of spoilers, until he had cast them out of his sight.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa daafan GODAI Israa7eela zeretta ubbaa aggi bayiis. I eta tuggayidi, ba sinttappe diggana gakkanaashin, eta bonqqiyaageetu kushiyan yeggi bayiis.

English Sentences: For he rent Israel from the house of David; and they made Jeroboam the son of Nebat king: and Jeroboam drave Israel from following the LORD, and made them sin a great sin.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Israa7eela asaa Daawita zerettatu kawotettaappe beni shaakkido wode, Israa7eela asai Nabaaxa na7aa Iyorbbaama banttau kawoyidosona. Hegaappe guyyiyan, Israa7eela asai GODAA kaallennaadan Iyorbbaami diggiis; i eta hanttaara nagaraa ootissiis.

English Sentences: For the children of Israel walked in all the sins of Jeroboam which he did; they departed not from them;
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hananabaa yootiya ba ashkkaratu ubbatu baggaara kase yooti wottidoogaadan, ba sinttappe diggana gakkanaashin, Israa7eela asai Iyorbbaami oottido nagaraa ubbaa oottiis.

English Sentences: Until the LORD removed Israel out of his sight, as he had said by all his servants the prophets. So was Israel carried away out of their own land to Assyria unto this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Israa7eela asai bantta yelettido biittaappe omoodettidi, Asoore biitti biidosona; biidi eti hanno gakkanaashinkka yan de7oosona.

English Sentences: And the king of Assyria brought men from Babylon, and from Cuthah, and from Ava, and from Hamath, and from Sepharvaim, and placed them in the cities of Samaria instead of the children of Israel: and they possessed Samaria, and dwelt in the cities thereof.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Asoore kawoi Baabiloone biittan de7iya Kuuta, Iiwa, Hamaatanne Safariwaima geetettiya katamatun de7iya asaa ehiis; ehiidi Israa7eela asaa sohuwan Samaariyaa katamatun wottiis. Eti he katamata laattidi, etan de7idosona.

English Sentences: And so it was at the beginning of their dwelling there, that they feared not the LORD: therefore the LORD sent lions among them, which slew some of them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti koiro yan duussaa doommido wode, GODAASSI goinnibookkona. Hegaa daafan GODAI eta giddo gaammota yeddiis; yeddin gaammoti eta giddoppe aramata mentterettidi woridosona.

English Sentences: Wherefore they spake to the king of Assyria, saying, The nations which thou hast removed, and placed in the cities of Samaria, know not the manner of the God of the land: therefore he hath sent lions among them, and, behold, they slay them, because they know not the manner of the God of the land.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin Asoore kawuwaa, "Neeni dentta efaada Samaariyaa katamatun wottido asai he biittaa xoossaa wogaa erenna. Erennaagaa daafan i eta mentteretti woriya gaammota eta bolli yeddiis" yaagidi yootidosona.

English Sentences: Then the king of Assyria commanded, saying, Carry thither one of the priests whom ye brought from thence; and let them go and dwell there, and let him teach them the manner of the God of the land.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yootin Asoore kawoi, "Intte Samaariyaappe omooddidi ehiido qeesetuppe issuwaa zaaridi, yaa yeddite. Yeddin i yan de7idi, he biittaa xoossaa wogaa eta tamaarisso" yaagidi azaziis.

English Sentences: Then one of the priests whom they had carried away from Samaria came and dwelt in Bethel, and taught them how they should fear the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Samaariyaappe omooddidi efiido qeesetuppe issoi Beeteelen de7anau yiis; yiidi GODAAYYO goinniyo wogaa eta tamaarissiis.

English Sentences: Howbeit every nation made gods of their own, and put them in the houses of the high places which the Samaritans had made, every nation in their cities wherein they dwelt.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gidikkonne Samaariyaa yiidi uttida asai bau goinniyo eeqa misileta ba de7iyoosan de7iyoosan medhdhiis. Medhdhidi Samaariyaa asai keexxido goinniyo xoqqa sohotun wottiis.

English Sentences: And the men of Babylon made Succothbenoth, and the men of Cuth made Nergal, and the men of Hamath made Ashima,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa maaran Baabiloone asai Sukkoti-Banooba giyo eeqaa misileta medhdhiis. Kuuta asai Nerggaala giyo eeqaa misileta medhdhiis. Hamaata asai qassi Ishiima giyo eeqaa misileta medhdhiis.

English Sentences: And the Avites made Nibhaz and Tartak, and the Sepharvites burnt their children in fire to Adrammelech and Anammelech, the gods of Sepharvaim.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iiwa asai Nibihaazanne Tarttaaqa geetettiya eeqatu misileta medhdhiis. Safariwaima asai qassi Adiraamelekanne Anaameleka geetettiya bantta xoossatuyyo bantta naata taman xuuggidi yarshshiis.

English Sentences: So they feared the LORD, and made unto themselves of the lowest of them priests of the high places, which sacrificed for them in the houses of the high places.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti GODAASSI goinnidosona; shin bantta giddoppe dumma dumma asaa dooridi, goinniyo xoqqa sohotun qeese oottidi sunttidosona.

English Sentences: They feared the LORD, and served their own gods, after the manner of the nations whom they carried away from thence.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti GODAASSI goinnidosona; shin bantta yiido biittaa biittaa asaa meeziyaa kaallidi, bantta xoossatuyyookka goinnidosona.

English Sentences: Unto this day they do after the former manners: they fear not the LORD, neither do they after their statutes, or after their ordinances, or after the law and commandment which the LORD commanded the children of Jacob, whom he named Israel;
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti hachchi gakkanaashinkka kase bantta meeziyaadan oottoosona. Eti tumuppe GODAAYYO goinnokkona woikko GODAI Israa7eela giidi sunttido Yaaqooba zerettaassi immido awaajuwaanne wogaa, higgiyaanne azazuwaa naagokkona.

English Sentences: With whom the LORD had made a covenant, and charged them, saying, Ye shall not fear other gods, nor bow yourselves to them, nor serve them, nor sacrifice to them:
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Israa7eela asaara beni maacettido wode, eta hagaadan yaagidi azaziis; "Hara xoossatussi goinnoppite; etau gulbbatoppite; etau oottoppite woikko etau yarshshoppite.

English Sentences: But the LORD, who brought you up out of the land of Egypt with great power and a stretched out arm, him shall ye fear, and him shall ye worship, and to him shall ye do sacrifice.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Gibxxeppe inttena ba gita wolqqaaninne ba yeddido kushiyan kessida GODAAYYO oottite; ayyo gulbbatite; ayyo yarshshuwaa yarshshite.

English Sentences: And the statutes, and the ordinances, and the law, and the commandment, which he wrote for you, ye shall observe to do for evermore; and ye shall not fear other gods.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani GODAI intteyyo xaafido awaajuwaanne wogaa, higgiyaanne azazuwaa ubba wode naagite; hara xoossatuyyo goinnoppite.

English Sentences: And the covenant that I have made with you ye shall not forget; neither shall ye fear other gods.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani inttenaara maacettido maachchaa dogoppite; hara xoossatuyyookka goinnoppite.

English Sentences: But the LORD your God ye shall fear; and he shall deliver you out of the hand of all your enemies.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa aggidi, GODAAYYO intte Xoossaayyo goinnite. Intte morkketu ubbaappe inttena ashshanaagee tana" yaagidi azaziis.

English Sentences: Howbeit they did not hearken, but they did after their former manner.
Wolaitta Sentences: Azazinkka eti ayyo eenennan ixxidi, kase bantta meeziyaakka baqqi oiqqidosona.

English Sentences: So these nations feared the LORD, and served their graven images, both their children, and their children's children: as did their fathers, so do they unto this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: He asati GODAAYYO goinniiddikka, issi baggaara bantta eeqaa misiletuyyo goinnoosona. Hachchi gakkanaashinkka eta zerettai eta aawati goinniyoogaadan goinniiddi de7ees.

English Sentences: Now it came to pass in the third year of Hoshea son of Elah king of Israel, that Hezekiah the son of Ahaz king of Judah began to reign.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eela na7ai Hoshee7i Israa7eelan kawotido heezzantto laittan Yihudaa Kawuwaa Akaaza na7ai Hizqqiyaasi kawotiis.

English Sentences: Twenty and five years old was he when he began to reign; and he reigned twenty and nine years in Jerusalem. His mother's name also was Abi, the daughter of Zachariah.
Wolaitta Sentences: I kawotiyo wode laittai ayyo laatamanne ichchasha; Yerusalaamen i laatamanne uddufun laittaa kawotiis. A aayee sunttai Abiiyo geetettees; a Zakkaariyaasa na7iyo.

English Sentences: And he did that which was right in the sight of the LORD, according to all that David his father did.
Wolaitta Sentences: A maizza aawaa Daawiti oottidoogaadan, Hizqqiyaasikka GODAA sinttan suurebaa oottiis.

English Sentences: He removed the high places, and brake the images, and cut down the groves, and brake in pieces the brasen serpent that Moses had made: for unto those days the children of Israel did burn incense to it: and he called it Nehushtan.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai goinniyo xoqqa sohota i diggiis. Eeqa tuussata mentterettiis. Asheero giyo xoossee misiliyaa qanxxi oliis. Qassi Muusee nahaasiyaappe medhdhido shooshshaakka mentterettiis. Aissi giikko, he wodee gakkanaashinkka Israa7eela asai ayyo ixaanaa cuwayiiddi takkiis. He shooshshaa sunttai Nehushttaana.

English Sentences: He trusted in the LORD God of Israel; so that after him was none like him among all the kings of Judah, nor any that were before him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hizqqiyaasi GODAA Israa7eela Xoossaa ammaniis; Yihudaa kawotu ubbaa giddon a mala kawoi appe kase gidin, appe guyye gidin beettibeenna.

English Sentences: For he clave to the LORD, and departed not from following him, but kept his commandments, which the LORD commanded Moses.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, GODAA i baxuuxiis; GODAA kaalliyoogaa aggibeenna; GODAI Muusa azazido azazota naagiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD was with him; and he prospered whithersoever he went forth: and he rebelled against the king of Assyria, and served him not.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI aara issippe gidiis; yaatin i oottiyoobai ubbai ayyo injjetiis. I Asoore kawuwaa bolli makkaliis; makkalidi ayyo haarettennan ixxiis.

English Sentences: He smote the Philistines, even unto Gaza, and the borders thereof, from the tower of the watchmen to the fenced city.
Wolaitta Sentences: I Pilisxxeema asaa oliis; olidi qii guutta moottaappe biidi, wogga gita katamaa gakkanaashin, Gaazakka a yuushuwan de7iya biittatikka attennan eti de7iyo sohota ubbaa xooniis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass in the fourth year of king Hezekiah, which was the seventh year of Hoshea son of Elah king of Israel, that Shalmaneser king of Assyria came up against Samaria, and besieged it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Hizqqiyaasi kawotido oiddantto laittan, Eela na7ai Israa7eela Kawoi Hoshee7i kawotido laappuntta laittan, Asoore Kawoi SHalmman77eeseri Israa7eela bolli woraajjiis; woraajjidi Samaariyaa katamaa dooddiis.

English Sentences: And at the end of three years they took it: even in the sixth year of Hezekiah, that is the ninth year of Hoshea king of Israel, Samaria was taken.
Wolaitta Sentences: Dooddido heezzantto laitti Samaariyaa katamaa xooniis. Yaatin Hizqqiyaasi kawotido usuppuntta laittan, Israa7eela kawoi Hoshee7i kawotido uddufuntta laittan, Samaariyaa katamai xoonettiis.

English Sentences: And the king of Assyria did carry away Israel unto Assyria, and put them in Halah and in Habor by the river of Gozan, and in the cities of the Medes:
Wolaitta Sentences: Asoore kawoi Israa7eela asaa Asoore biitti efiis. Efiidi eta attaa Halaaha kataman, attaa Meedoonatu kataman, haraata qassi Gozaana biittan de7iya Haboora SHaafaa matan wottiis.

English Sentences: Because they obeyed not the voice of the LORD their God, but transgressed his covenant, and all that Moses the servant of the LORD commanded, and would not hear them, nor do them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagee hanidoogee eti GODAASSI bantta Xoossaassi azazettennan ixxidi, GODAA maachchaa, GODAA ashkkarai Muusee azazido azazuwaa ubbaa kanttido daafaana. Eti a azazota siyanaukka azazettanaukka koyibookkona.

English Sentences: Now in the fourteenth year of king Hezekiah did Sennacherib king of Assyria come up against all the fenced cities of Judah, and took them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Hizqqiyaasi kawotido tammanne oiddantto laittan, Asoore Kawoi Sanaakireebi gimbbetti uttida Yihudaa katamata ubbaa olidi oiqqiis.

English Sentences: And Hezekiah king of Judah sent to the king of Assyria to Lachish, saying, I have offended; return from me: that which thou puttest on me will I bear. And the king of Assyria appointed unto Hezekiah king of Judah three hundred talents of silver and thirty talents of gold.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin Yihudaa Kawoi Hizqqiyaasi Laakisha kataman de7iya Asoore Kawuwaa Sanaakireebassi kiitaa yeddidi, "Taani mooraas. Hayyanaa ta biittaa yeddada kiya. Neeni tana oichchidobaa aibanne ta immana" yaagiis. Yaagin Asoore kawoi Yihudaa Kawuwaa Hizqqiyaasa, "Neeni tammu sha7u kilo giraame biraanne issi sha7u kilo giraame worqqaa tau yedda" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Hezekiah gave him all the silver that was found in the house of the LORD, and in the treasures of the king's house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Hizqqiyaasi GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaaninne kawo keettaa buquraa minjjiyoosan de7ida biraa ubbaa ayyo yeddiis.

English Sentences: At that time did Hezekiah cut off the gold from the doors of the temple of the LORD, and from the pillars which Hezekiah king of Judah had overlaid, and gave it to the king of Assyria.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode Yihudaa Kawoi Hizqqiyaasi GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaa penggiyaa sanqqata maayi uttida worqqaanne qassi i ba huuphen he pengge qosilettata maizzi wottido worqqaa poqqi qaaridi, Asoore kawuwaayyo yeddiis.

English Sentences: And the king of Assyria sent Tartan and Rabsaris and Rabshakeh from Lachish to king Hezekiah with a great host against Jerusalem. And they went up and came to Jerusalem. And when they were come up, they came and stood by the conduit of the upper pool, which is in the highway of the fuller's field.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Asoore kawoi heezzu ola gadaawata cora olanchchatuura Laakisha giyo katamaappe Kawuwaa Hizqqiyaasakko Yerusalaame yeddiis. Yeddin eti biidi, Yerusalaame gakkidosona; gakkidi Maayuwaa Meecciyaagaa gade efiya ogiyaappe qommo baggaara de7iya, dagattida haattai goggiyo zaraa lanqqen eqqidosona.

English Sentences: And when they had called to the king, there came out to them Eliakim the son of Hilkiah, which was over the household, and Shebna the scribe, and Joah the son of Asaph the recorder.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatidi eti kawuwaa xeesidosona. Xeesin Hilqqiyaa na7ai kawo keettan aawatiya Eliyaaqiimi, waanna xaafee SHeebininne Asaafa na7ai taarikiyaa xaafiya Yo7aahi akko kare kiyidosona.

English Sentences: And Rabshakeh said unto them, Speak ye now to Hezekiah, Thus saith the great king, the king of Assyria, What confidence is this wherein thou trustest?
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiyin Asooretu gadaawai eta, "Hizqqiyaasassi hagaadan yaagidi yootite; Asoore kawoi, wolqqaamai nena hagaadan yaagees; "Neeni hagaa keeni aibin ammanettadii?

English Sentences: Thou sayest, (but they are but vain words,) I have counsel and strength for the war. Now on whom dost thou trust, that thou rebellest against me?
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni coo mela, Olaa olettanau taayyo aadhdhida erainne wolqqainne de7ees yaagaasa. SHin neeni oonan ammanettada ta bolli hagaa makkaladii?

English Sentences: Now, behold, thou trustest upon the staff of this bruised reed, even upon Egypt, on which if a man lean, it will go into his hand, and pierce it: so is Pharaoh king of Egypt unto all that trust on him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni Gibxxe kawoi maaddana gaada qoppidabaa gidikko, meqqida shombboqo gatiman guufetiya asa mala. Aissi giikko, gatimai meqqin, pinccoi kushiyaa caddeesinne masunxxissees. Gibxxe Kawoi banan ammanettiya asa ubbau hegaa mala.

English Sentences: But if ye say unto me, We trust in the LORD our God: is not that he, whose high places and whose altars Hezekiah hath taken away, and hath said to Judah and Jerusalem, Ye shall worship before this altar in Jerusalem?
Wolaitta Sentences: ""SHin neeni taayyo, Nuuni GODAN nu Xoossan ammanettoos yaagikko, Hizqqiyaasi Yihudaa asaanne Yerusalaame asaa, Intte Yerusalaamen de7iya yarshshiyoosan goinnanau koshshees giidi, ayyo goinniyo xoqqa sohotanne yarshsho sohota diggirggido Xoossaa i gidennee?

English Sentences: Now therefore, I pray thee, give pledges to my lord the king of Assyria, and I will deliver thee two thousand horses, if thou be able on thy part to set riders upon them.
Wolaitta Sentences: ""Ane ha77i haaya! Yaada ta godaa Asoore kawuwaara naasetta. Neeni togganau danddayiya, gidiya asa demmikko, naa77u sha7u parata taani neeyyo immana.

English Sentences: How then wilt thou turn away the face of one captain of the least of my master's servants, and put thy trust on Egypt for chariots and for horsemen?
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni Gibxxeti paraasatanne paraa gaareta taayyo yeddana gaada ammanikkonne, ta godaa olanchchatu halaqatuppe issi laafiyaagaakka zaaranau danddayakka.

English Sentences: Am I now come up without the LORD against this place to destroy it? The LORD said to me, Go up against this land, and destroy it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa bollikka qassi, taani ha77i tumu GODAA azazoi bainnan ha biittaa xaissanau kiyidanaa? GODAI ba huuphen tana, Ba, he biittaa baada, olada bashsha yaagidi odiis" yaagees yaagite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then said Eliakim the son of Hilkiah, and Shebna, and Joah, unto Rabshakeh, Speak, I pray thee, to thy servants in the Syrian language; for we understand it: and talk not with us in the Jews' language in the ears of the people that are on the wall.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Hilqqiyaa na7ai Eliyaaqiimi, SHeebininne Yo7aahi Asooretu gadaawaa hagaadan yaagidosona; "Nuuni birshshettaa eriyo gishshau, hayyanaa neeni nuuyyo ne ashkkaratuyyo Sooriyaa qaalan oda. Dirssaa gimbbiyaa huuphiyan de7iya asai siyenna mala, Ibraawetto qaalan nuuyyo odoppa" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: But Rabshakeh said unto them, Hath my master sent me to thy master, and to thee, to speak these words? hath he not sent me to the men which sit on the wall, that they may eat their own dung, and drink their own piss with you?
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin gadaawai zaarettidi, "Ha qaalata taani inttessinne intte godaa xalaalaassi yootanau tana ta godai kiittideeyye? Inttenaara issippe bantta shiyaa maanaunne bantta sheeshshaa uyanau de7iya, ha dirssaa gimbbiyaa bolli uttida asaassaara ubbau odanaassa gidenneeyye?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then Rabshakeh stood and cried with a loud voice in the Jews' language, and spake, saying, Hear the word of the great king, the king of Assyria:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Asooretu gadaawai denddi eqqidi, ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, Ibraawetto qaalan hagaadan yaagiis; "Asoore kawoi wolqqaamai inttena giyoobaa siyite!

English Sentences: Thus saith the king, Let not Hezekiah deceive you: for he shall not be able to deliver you out of his hand:
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi inttena hagaadan yaagees; Hizqqiyaasi inttena cimmoppo; aissi giikko, i inttena ta kushiyaappe wotti ekkanau danddayenna.

English Sentences: Neither let Hezekiah make you trust in the LORD, saying, The LORD will surely deliver us, and this city shall not be delivered into the hand of the king of Assyria.
Wolaitta Sentences: I inttena, "GODAI tuma nuna ashshana; ha katamaikka Asoore kawuwaa kushiyan gelenna" yaagidi inttena GODAN ammanttoppo yaagees.

English Sentences: Hearken not to Hezekiah: for thus saith the king of Assyria, Make an agreement with me by a present, and come out to me, and then eat ye every man of his own vine, and every one of his fig tree, and drink ye every one the waters of his cistern:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ee, intte Hizqqiyaasi odiyoobaa siyoppite. Asoore kawoi inttena, Tanaara sigettite; haa taakko kiyite. Yaatikko intte ubbaikka intte woiniyaa teeraappenne intte balasiyaa teeraappe miishshana; intte bookkido ollaappekka haattaa uyishshana.

English Sentences: Until I come and take you away to a land like your own land, a land of corn and wine, a land of bread and vineyards, a land of oil olive and of honey, that ye may live, and not die: and hearken not unto Hezekiah, when he persuadeth you, saying, The LORD will deliver us.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, taani yaada, inttena intte biittaa milatiya biitti ekkada efaana. He biittai kattinne woine eessi, oittinne woine ataakilttee kumido biitta; wogarainne mattaa eessainne kumido biitta. Intte taayyo azazettikko, paxa de7ana; haiqqekketa yaagees. "Hizqqiyaasi inttena, GODAI nuna ashshana yaagidi cimmiyoogaa siyoppite.

English Sentences: Hath any of the gods of the nations delivered at all his land out of the hand of the king of Assyria?
Wolaitta Sentences: Dere asatu xoossatuppe ba biittaa Asoore kawuwaa kushiyaappe ashshida xoossi de7iiyye?

English Sentences: Where are the gods of Hamath, and of Arpad? where are the gods of Sepharvaim, Hena, and Ivah? have they delivered Samaria out of mine hand?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hamaata xoossatinne Arifaada xoossati awan de7iyoonaa? Safariwaima, Henaa7anne Iiwa xoossati awan de7iyoonaa? Eti Samaariyaa ta kushiyaappe wotti ekkidonaa?

English Sentences: Who are they among all the gods of the countries, that have delivered their country out of mine hand, that the LORD should deliver Jerusalem out of mine hand?
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha biittatu xoossatu ubbaa giddon ba biittaa ta kushiyaappe ai xoossi ashshidoogaa shin, GODAI Yerusalaame ta kushiyaappe ashshanee?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: But the people held their peace, and answered him not a word: for the king's commandment was, saying, Answer him not.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin asai issi qaalanne ayyo zaarennan co77u giis. Aissi giikko, kawoi eta, "Ayyo ainne zaaridi odoppite" yaagi wottiis.

English Sentences: Then came Eliakim the son of Hilkiah, which was over the household, and Shebna the scribe, and Joah the son of Asaph the recorder, to Hezekiah with their clothes rent, and told him the words of Rabshakeh.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Hilqqiyaa na7ai kawo keettan aawatiya Eliyaaqiimi, waanna xaafee SHeebininne taarikiyaa xaafee Asaafa na7ai Yo7aahi bantta maayuwaa pooshshidi, Hizqqiyaasakko biidosona; biidi Asooretu gadaawai giidobaa ubbaa ayyo odidosona.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, when king Hezekiah heard it, that he rent his clothes, and covered himself with sackcloth, and went into the house of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Hizqqiyaasi hegaa siyido wode, ba maayuwaa pooshshiis; pooshshidi waaruwaa maayidi, GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaa geliis.

English Sentences: And he sent Eliakim, which was over the household, and Shebna the scribe, and the elders of the priests, covered with sackcloth, to Isaiah the prophet the son of Amoz.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawo keettan aawatiya Eliyaaqiimi, waanna xaafee SHeebininne cima qeeseti waaruwaa maayidi, Amoxa na7aa hananabaa yootiya Isiyaasakko baana mala kiittiis.

English Sentences: And they said unto him, Thus saith Hezekiah, This day is a day of trouble, and of rebuke, and blasphemy; for the children are come to the birth, and there is not strength to bring forth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiittin eti Isiyaasakko biidi, "Hizqqiyaasi hagaadan yaagees; Hachchi gallassai meto gallassa, seera gallassanne yeella gallassa. Hegeekka na7i yelettanau wodee gakkin, bannakkada yelanau maccaaseessi wolqqi xayiyoogaa mala.

English Sentences: It may be the LORD thy God will hear all the words of Rabshakeh, whom the king of Assyria his master hath sent to reproach the living God; and will reprove the words which the LORD thy God hath heard: wherefore lift up thy prayer for the remnant that are left.
Wolaitta Sentences: De7o Xoossaa cayanaadan, a godai, Asoore kawoi, kiittido gadaawaa qaalaa ubbaa GODAI, ne Xoossai siyennan aggenna. Qassi GODAI, ne Xoossai he siyido qaalaa daafan a qaxxayennan aggenna. Hegaa gishshau, nu asaa giddon palahi attanaageetussi woossa! yaagees" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: So the servants of king Hezekiah came to Isaiah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawuwaa Hizqqiyaasa ashkkarati Isiyaasakko yiido wode,

English Sentences: And Isaiah said unto them, Thus shall ye say to your master, Thus saith the LORD, Be not afraid of the words which thou hast heard, with which the servants of the king of Assyria have blasphemed me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Isiyaasi eta hagaadan yaagiis; "Intte godaassi hagaadan yaagidi odite; GODAI nena, "Asoore kawuwaa ashkkarati tana cayishin, neeni siyido cashshaa qaalaassi yayyoppa.

English Sentences: Behold, I will send a blast upon him, and he shall hear a rumour, and shall return to his own land; and I will cause him to fall by the sword in his own land.
Wolaitta Sentences: Be7a, oduwaa siyidi, i ba biitti simmana mala, taani a giddon issi ayyaanaa wottana. Yaatada i ba biitti biidi, yan bisuwan i haiqqanaadan taani a oottana" yaagees yaagite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So Rabshakeh returned, and found the king of Assyria warring against Libnah: for he had heard that he was departed from Lachish.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asoore kawoi Laakisha katamaappe denddidi biichchidoogaa Asooretu gadaawai siyidi, guyye simmiis. Simmidi kawoi Liibina kataman olettiyaagaa demmiis.

English Sentences: And when he heard say of Tirhakah king of Ethiopia, Behold, he is come out to fight against thee: he sent messengers again unto Hezekiah, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Sanaakireebi, "Toophphiyaa Kawoi Tirihaaqi nena olanau yiis" yaagiyo oduwaa siyiis. Siyidi Hizqqiyaasassi hagaadan yaagidi kiittiis;

English Sentences: Thus shall ye speak to Hezekiah king of Judah, saying, Let not thy God in whom thou trustest deceive thee, saying, Jerusalem shall not be delivered into the hand of the king of Assyria.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Yihudaa Kawuwau Hizqqiyaasaa, neeni ammanettiyo xoossai nena, Yerusalaamee Asoore kawuwaa kushiyan gelenna yaagidi cimmoppo.

English Sentences: Behold, thou hast heard what the kings of Assyria have done to all lands, by destroying them utterly: and shalt thou be delivered?
Wolaitta Sentences: Be7a, Asoore kawoti biittata ubbaa muleera xaissidi, eti oottidobaa neeni siyadasa. Yaatin neeni attuutee?

English Sentences: Have the gods of the nations delivered them which my fathers have destroyed; as Gozan, and Haran, and Rezeph, and the children of Eden which were in Thelasar?
Wolaitta Sentences: Beni ta maizza aawati bashshido biittatu xoossati, hegeetinne Gozaana, Kaaraanenne Rexeefa biittatu xoossatinne Talassaaran de7iya Edene asaa xoossati he biittata bashshaappe ashshidonaa?

English Sentences: Where is the king of Hamath, and the king of Arpad, and the king of the city of Sepharvaim, of Hena, and Ivah?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hamaata kawoi, Arifaada kawoi, Safariwaima kawoi, Henaa7a kawoinne Iiwa kawoi awan de7iyoonaa?" yaagidi kiittiis.

English Sentences: And Hezekiah received the letter of the hand of the messengers, and read it: and Hezekiah went up into the house of the LORD, and spread it before the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hizqqiyaasi dabddaabbiyaa kiitettida asatuppe ekkidi nabbabiis. Nabbabido dabddaabbiyaa GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaa ekki efiidi, GODAA sinttan micciis.

English Sentences: And Hezekiah prayed before the LORD, and said, O LORD God of Israel, which dwellest between the cherubims, thou art the God, even thou alone, of all the kingdoms of the earth; thou hast made heaven and earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatidi GODAA hagaadan yaagidi woossiis; "Abeet GODAU, kiruubetuppe gidduwan uttiya Israa7eela Xoossau, sa7aa kawotettatu ubbaa bolli ne xalaalai Xoossaa. Saluwaanne sa7aa neeni medhdhadasa.

English Sentences: LORD, bow down thine ear, and hear: open, LORD, thine eyes, and see: and hear the words of Sennacherib, which hath sent him to reproach the living God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ne haittaa haa yeggada siya. Abeet GODAU, ne aifiyaa pogada xeella. Nena, de7o Xoossaa cayanau Sanaakireebi kiittido qaalaa siya.

English Sentences: Of a truth, LORD, the kings of Assyria have destroyed the nations and their lands,
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, Asoore biittaa kawoti kawotettatanne eta biittaa bashshidoogee ee tuma.

English Sentences: And have cast their gods into the fire: for they were no gods, but the work of men's hands, wood and stone: therefore they have destroyed them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta xoossata taman xuuggi xaissidosona; aissi giikko, eta xoossati wonikka asa kushee massidi kessido mittanne shuchchanne gidiyo gishshau, tumu xoossata gidokkona; hegaa gishshau, eti eta xaissidosona.

English Sentences: Now therefore, O LORD our God, I beseech thee, save thou us out of his hand, that all the kingdoms of the earth may know that thou art the LORD God, even thou only.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ne xalaalai Xoossaa gidiyoogaa sa7aa kawotettati ubbai erana mala, ha77i simmi, GODAU, nu Xoossau, neeni nuna a kushiyaappe wotta ekka!" yaagidi woossiis.

English Sentences: Then Isaiah the son of Amoz sent to Hezekiah, saying, Thus saith the LORD God of Israel, That which thou hast prayed to me against Sennacherib king of Assyria I have heard.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Amoxa na7ai Isiyaasi Hizqqiyaasassi hagaadan yaagidi kiittiis; "GODAI Israa7eela Xoossai hagaadan yaagees; Neeni Asoore Kawuwaa Sanaakireeba gaasuwan tana woossido woosaa siyaas yaagees.

English Sentences: This is the word that the LORD hath spoken concerning him; The virgin the daughter of Zion hath despised thee, and laughed thee to scorn; the daughter of Jerusalem hath shaken her head at thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Sanaakireebabaa hagaadan yaagidi haasayees; "Xiyoonen de7iya asai nena karees; Yerusalaame asai ba huuphiyaa qaattidi, nena qoosees.

English Sentences: Whom hast thou reproached and blasphemed? and against whom hast thou exalted thy voice, and lifted up thine eyes on high? even against the Holy One of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Neeni cayidoogeenne toochchidoogee oonee? Neeni o bollan ne qaalaa xoqqu oottada haasayadii? Qassi otoruwan oona xoqqu gaada xeelladii? Hegaa neeni oottidoi ta bollaana, Israa7eela Geeshshaa bollaana gidennee!

English Sentences: By thy messengers thou hast reproached the LORD, and hast said, With the multitude of my chariots I am come up to the height of the mountains, to the sides of Lebanon, and will cut down the tall cedar trees thereof, and the choice fir trees thereof: and I will enter into the lodgings of his borders, and into the forest of his Carmel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni kiittido asatu baggaara GODAA cayadasa. Qassi hagaadan yaagadasa; "Taani taayyo de7iya cora paraa gaaretun xoqqa deretu huuphiyaa, Liibaanoosa Deriyaa kiikiyaa kiyaas. Kiyada ubbaappe aduqqiya zigatanne ubbaappe lo77iya xiiddata qanxxaas. Taani ayyo wurssetta gaxaanne tuujjuma woraa gakkaas.

English Sentences: I have digged and drunk strange waters, and with the sole of my feet have I dried up all the rivers of besieged places.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani allaga biittatun haatta ollata bookkada, haattaa etappe uyaas. Gibxxe biittan goggiya haatta ubbaa taani ta tohuwaa gomppan yedhdhada melissaas" yaagadasa.

English Sentences: Hast thou not heard long ago how I have done it, and of ancient times that I have formed it? now have I brought it to pass, that thou shouldest be to lay waste fenced cities into ruinous heaps.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Daro wodiyaappe kase neeni gimbbettida katamata qoqqofada, shuchcha keela kessana mala, taani qofaa qachcha wottidoogaa neeni erabeikkii? Taani ha77i poliyo halchchota beni halchcha wottaas.

English Sentences: Therefore their inhabitants were of small power, they were dismayed and confounded; they were as the grass of the field, and as the green herb, as the grass on the house tops, and as corn blasted before it be grown up.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, eta asaayyo wolqqai ixxin, eti kauyyidosonanne yeellatidosona. Eti gade maataa mala; goshshan mokkida carshshaa mala. Eti keettaa huuphiyan mokkiya sharafaadaaninne ka77ennan de7ishin, leegee miido kattaadan hanidosona.

English Sentences: But I know thy abode, and thy going out, and thy coming in, and thy rage against me.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin neeni uttiyoosaa, kiyiyoosaa, geliyoosaanne ta bolli neeni hanqqettido hanqquwaa taani erais.

English Sentences: Because thy rage against me and thy tumult is come up into mine ears, therefore I will put my hook in thy nose, and my bridle in thy lips, and I will turn thee back by the way by which thou camest.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ta bolli hanqqettido gishshaunne ne otoruwaakka taani siyido gishshau, taani ne siiriyan ta dafuwaa aattana; ne doonankka ta bixaalaa barssana. Yaatada ne yiido ogiyaara taani nena guyye zaarana yaagees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And this shall be a sign unto thee, Ye shall eat this year such things as grow of themselves, and in the second year that which springeth of the same; and in the third year sow ye, and reap, and plant vineyards, and eat the fruits thereof.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Isiyaasi Kawuwaa Hizqqiyaasa hagaadan yaagiis; "Hagee polettanaagau neeyyo malaatai hagaa: Ha laitti intte azabba mokkida kattaa maana; laitti qassi ha laitti mokkidaagaa azabbaa maana. SHin kaalla laitti intte intte huuphen zeritenne cakkite; woiniyaa turaakka tokkitenne a teeraa miite.

English Sentences: And the remnant that is escaped of the house of Judah shall yet again take root downward, and bear fruit upward.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa asaa atettati xaphuwaa duge yeddidi, bollan aifiyaa aifiya mittaa mala gidana.

English Sentences: For out of Jerusalem shall go forth a remnant, and they that escape out of mount Zion: the zeal of the LORD of hosts shall do this.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, wuriiddi attidaageeti Yerusalaameppe, palahidaageetikka Xiyooneppe kiyana. Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAA mishoi hegaa oottidi polana.

English Sentences: Therefore thus saith the LORD concerning the king of Assyria, He shall not come into this city, nor shoot an arrow there, nor come before it with shield, nor cast a bank against it.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaa gishshau, Asoore kawuwaabaa GODAI hagaadan yaagees; Asoore kawoi ha katamaa gelenna; woikko hagan ba wonddafiyaa dukkenna. I ba gonddalliyaa oiqqidi, ha katamaa sintti aadhdhenna; woikko qassi katamaa yuushuwaa biittaa dooriyan diddiqenna.

English Sentences: By the way that he came, by the same shall he return, and shall not come into this city, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asoore kawoi ba yiido ogiyaara guyye simmana; i ha katamaa gelenna. Taani GODAI hagaa odaas.

English Sentences: For I will defend this city, to save it, for mine own sake, and for my servant David's sake.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta bonchchuwaa gishshaunne ta ashkkaraa Daawita gishshau, ha katamaa boshissennan ashsha ekkana yaagees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass that night, that the angel of the LORD went out, and smote in the camp of the Assyrians an hundred fourscore and five thousand: and when they arose early in the morning, behold, they were all dead corpses.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassi qammi GODAA kiitanchchai kiyidi, Asoore asai dunkkaanidosan issi xeetanne hosppun tammanne ichchashu sha7u attumaasaa woriis. Yaatin asai maallado suuridi be7iyo wode, haiqqida asaa ahai hegan kumiis.

English Sentences: So Sennacherib king of Assyria departed, and went and returned, and dwelt at Nineveh.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Asoore Kawoi Sanaakireebi denddidi, guyye simmi biidi, Nanawe kataman uttiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, as he was worshipping in the house of Nisroch his god, that Adrammelech and Sharezer his sons smote him with the sword: and they escaped into the land of Armenia. And Esarhaddon his son reigned in his stead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi gallassi Sanaakireebi ba xoossaa Nisirooka Eeqaa Keettan goinniiddi de7ishin, a naati Adiraamelekinne Sar77eexeri bisuwan a woridosona. Woridi Araaraate giyo biitti baqatidosona. A na7ai Asaarihi a sohuwan kawotiis.

English Sentences: In those days was Hezekiah sick unto death. And the prophet Isaiah the son of Amoz came to him, and said unto him, Thus saith the LORD, Set thine house in order; for thou shalt die, and not live.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode Kawoi Hizqqiyaasi harggidi, haiqqana matiis. Yaanidaashin Amoxa na7ai hananabaa yootiya Isiyaasi akko biidi, "GODAI nena, Neeni haiqqaasappe attin paxakka; hegaa gishshau, ne keettaa giigissa yaagees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then he turned his face to the wall, and prayed unto the LORD, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Hizqqiyaasi godaakko simmi zin77idi, GODAA woossiis.

English Sentences: I beseech thee, O LORD, remember now how I have walked before thee in truth and with a perfect heart, and have done that which is good in thy sight. And Hezekiah wept sore.
Wolaitta Sentences: Woossiiddi, "Abeet GODAU, taani ne sinttan tumatettaaninne kumetta wozanan hemettidoogaanne qassi nena ufaissiyaabaa oottidoogaa taayyo neeni hassayana mala, taani nena woossais" yaagidi woossiis. Woossiiddi Hizqqiyaasi keehi mishettidi yeekkiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, afore Isaiah was gone out into the middle court, that the word of the LORD came to him, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Isiyaasi kawuwaa sinttappe kiyiis; kiyidi kawo keettaa dabaabaappe kanttidi biichchennan de7ishin, GODAA qaalai hagaadan yaagiiddi, akko yiis.

English Sentences: Turn again, and tell Hezekiah the captain of my people, Thus saith the LORD, the God of David thy father, I have heard thy prayer, I have seen thy tears: behold, I will heal thee: on the third day thou shalt go up unto the house of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yiidi, "Guyye simmada ba; baada ta asaa kaalettiya Hizqqiyaasayyo hagaadan yaagada oda; GODAI, ne maizza aawaa Daawita Xoossai hagaadan yaagees; "Taani ne woosaa siyaas; ne afuttaakka be7aas. Taani nena pattana; heezzu gallassaappe guyyiyan, neeni pude GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaa baana.

English Sentences: And I will add unto thy days fifteen years; and I will deliver thee and this city out of the hand of the king of Assyria; and I will defend this city for mine own sake, and for my servant David's sake.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne laittaa bolli taani neeyyo tammanne ichchashu laittaa gujjana. Taani nenanne ha katamaanne Asoore biittaa kawuwaa kushiyaappe ashshana. Taani ta bonchchuwaa gishshaunne ta ashkkaraa Daawita gishshau, ha katamaayyo olettada ashshana" yaagees yaaga" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Isaiah said, Take a lump of figs. And they took and laid it on the boil, and he recovered.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Isiyaasi, "Balasiyaa teeraa daaxxidi, a kixaa bolli wottite. Yaatikko i paxana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Hezekiah said unto Isaiah, What shall be the sign that the LORD will heal me, and that I shall go up into the house of the LORD the third day?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hizqqiyaasi Isiyaasa, "GODAI tana pattanaagaunne taani heezzantto gallassi GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaa pude baanaagau malaatai aibee?" yaagidi oichchiis.

English Sentences: And Isaiah said, This sign shalt thou have of the LORD, that the LORD will do the thing that he hath spoken: shall the shadow go forward ten degrees, or go back ten degrees?
Wolaitta Sentences: Oichchin Isiyaasi, "GODAI ba giido qaalaa polanaagau neeyyo malaataa immana. Simmi neeni hagaappe augaa doorai? Hagee kuwai tammu xekkata sinttau baanaagaa dooraiyye, tammu xekkata hagaappe guyye simmanaagaa doorai?" yaagidi oichchiis.

English Sentences: And Hezekiah answered, It is a light thing for the shadow to go down ten degrees: nay, but let the shadow return backward ten degrees.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin Hizqqiyaasi a, "Kuwai sinttau baanaagee metenna; hegaappe kuwai guyye simmanaadan ootta" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Isaiah the prophet cried unto the LORD: and he brought the shadow ten degrees backward, by which it had gone down in the dial of Ahaz.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, hananabaa yootiya Isiyaasi GODAA woossiis; woossin GODAI Kawoi Akaazi gimbbissido xekkata kuwayida kuwaa tammu xekkata he sohuwaappe guyye zaariis.

English Sentences: At that time Berodachbaladan, the son of Baladan, king of Babylon, sent letters and a present unto Hezekiah: for he had heard that Hezekiah had been sick.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode Baladaana na7ai, Baabiloone Kawoi, Marodaaki Baladaani Hizqqiyaasi harggidoogaa siyido gishshau, dabddaabbiyaanne imuwaa Hizqqiyaasayyo yeddiis.

English Sentences: And Hezekiah hearkened unto them, and shewed them all the house of his precious things, the silver, and the gold, and the spices, and the precious ointment, and all the house of his armour, and all that was found in his treasures: there was nothing in his house, nor in all his dominion, that Hezekiah shewed them not.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yeddin Hizqqiyaasi kiitettidi yiida asata mokkiis. Yaatidi ba buquraa minjjiyo keettan de7iya biraa, worqqaa, sawuwaa, al77o zaitiyaa, ba ola miishshaanne ba buquraa minjjiyo keettan de7iyaabaa ubbaa eta bessiis. Ba son woikko ba kawotettaa giddon de7iyaabaa ubbaappe Hizqqiyaasi eta bessennan aggidobi aibinne baawa.

English Sentences: Then came Isaiah the prophet unto king Hezekiah, and said unto him, What said these men? and from whence came they unto thee? And Hezekiah said, They are come from a far country, even from Babylon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, hananabaa yootiya Isiyaasi Kawuwaa Hizqqiyaasakko yiidi, "Ha asati woigidonaa? Eti auppe yiidonaa?" yaagidi oichchiis. Oichchin Hizqqiyaasi, "Eti taakko haaho biittaappe, Baabilooneppe yiidosona" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said, What have they seen in thine house? And Hezekiah answered, All the things that are in mine house have they seen: there is nothing among my treasures that I have not shewed them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Isiyaasi qassikka, "Eti ne son ai ai be7idonaa?" yaagiis. Yaagin Hizqqiyaasi, "Eti ta son de7iya ubbabaa be7idosona; ta buquraa minjjiyo keettan de7iyaabaappe taani eta bessabeennabi aibinne baawa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Isaiah said unto Hezekiah, Hear the word of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Isiyaasi Hizqqiyaasa, "GODAI giyoobaa siya.

English Sentences: Behold, the days come, that all that is in thine house, and that which thy fathers have laid up in store unto this day, shall be carried into Babylon: nothing shall be left, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: I hagaadan yaagees; Ne kawo keettan de7iyaabai ubbabainne ne maizza aawati hachchi gakkanaashin shiishshidobai ubbabai muleera omoodettidi, Baabiloone biitti baana gallassati yaana; appe aibinne attenna.

English Sentences: And of thy sons that shall issue from thee, which thou shalt beget, shall they take away; and they shall be eunuchs in the palace of the king of Babylon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi neeyyo yelettana, ne ashonne ne suuttanne gidiya ne attuma zaretuppekka omoodettidi baana; biidi Baabiloone kawo keettan mureessa gididi oottana yaagees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then said Hezekiah unto Isaiah, Good is the word of the LORD which thou hast spoken. And he said, Is it not good, if peace and truth be in my days?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Hizqqiyaasi zaaridi, "Neeni odido GODAA qaalai lo77o" yaagiis. Aissi giikko, Hizqqiyaasi, "Taani de7ido laittan saroinne woppai de7ana gidennee" yaagidi qoppiis.

English Sentences: And the rest of the acts of Hezekiah, and all his might, and how he made a pool, and a conduit, and brought water into the city, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Judah?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hizqqiyaasi hanido harabai, a minotettainne haatta zeeridi, biitta giddoora waaruwan katamaa i gelissidobai Yihudaa Kawotu Taarikiyaa Maxaafan xaafetti uttiis.

English Sentences: And Hezekiah slept with his fathers: and Manasseh his son reigned in his stead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hizqqiyaasi haiqqidi, ba maizzan gaittiis; a sohuwan a na7ai Minaasee kawotiis.

English Sentences: Manasseh was twelve years old when he began to reign, and reigned fifty and five years in Jerusalem. And his mother's name was Hephzibah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Minaasee kawotiyo wode laittai ayyo tammanne naa77a; i Yerusalaamen ishatamanne ichchashu laitta kawotiis. A aayee sunttai Hefxxiibo.

English Sentences: And he did that which was evil in the sight of the LORD, after the abominations of the heathen, whom the LORD cast out before the children of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Israa7eela asaa sinttappe laaggidi kessido asatu de7uwaa wogaa, he sheneyiyaagaa qullidi, Minaasee GODAA sinttan iitabaa oottiis.

English Sentences: For he built up again the high places which Hezekiah his father had destroyed; and he reared up altars for Baal, and made a grove, as did Ahab king of Israel; and worshipped all the host of heaven, and served them.
Wolaitta Sentences: A aawai Hizqqiyaasi laalido, goinniyo xoqqa sohota i zaarettidi keexxiis; Israa7eela Kawoi Akaabi oottidoogaadan, Ba7aala giyo xoossaassi yarshshiyo sohotanne Asheero giyo xoossee misileta medhdhiis. Qassi saluwaa xoolinttetu ubbaayyookka goinniisinne etau oottiis.

English Sentences: And he built altars in the house of the LORD, of which the LORD said, In Jerusalem will I put my name.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI kase, "Taani ta sunttaa Yerusalaamen xeesissana" yaagi wottido GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyan hara xoossatussi yarshshiyo sohota giigissiis.

English Sentences: And he built altars for all the host of heaven in the two courts of the house of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyan de7iya naa77u dabaabatun saluwaa xoolinttetu ubbau yarshshiyo sohota giigissiis.

English Sentences: And he made his son pass through the fire, and observed times, and used enchantments, and dealt with familiar spirits and wizards: he wrought much wickedness in the sight of the LORD, to provoke him to anger.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba yelido na7aa taman xuuggidi yarshshiis. I ba huuphenkka bitiyaagaanne gojiyaagaa gididi, shareechchotanne moitilliyaa haasayissiyaageeta zoriyaa oichchiis. GODAA sinttan daro iitabaa oottidi, a hanqqetissiis.

English Sentences: And he set a graven image of the grove that he had made in the house, of which the LORD said to David, and to Solomon his son, In this house, and in Jerusalem, which I have chosen out of all tribes of Israel, will I put my name for ever:
Wolaitta Sentences: Asheero giyo xoossee misiliyaa, masetti kiyidaagaa ehiidi, GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaa giddon essiis. He Beeta Maqidasee, GODAI Daawitanne a na7aa Solomona, "Israa7eela zare ubbaa giddoppe taani doorido ha Beeta Maqidasiyaaninne Yerusalaamen taani ta sunttaa merinau xeesissana.

English Sentences: Neither will I make the feet of Israel move any more out of the land which I gave their fathers; only if they will observe to do according to all that I have commanded them, and according to all the law that my servant Moses commanded them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asaa taani azazido azazo ubbaanne ta ashkkarai Muusee etau immido higgiyaa ubbaa naagidi oottikko, taani eta maizza aawatuyyo immido biittaappe eta denttada toilayikke" yaagi wottido Beeta Maqidasiyaa.

English Sentences: But they hearkened not: and Manasseh seduced them to do more evil than did the nations whom the LORD destroyed before the children of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin asai siyennan ixxiis. GODAI Israa7eela asaa sinttappe xaissido dere asaagaappekka aadhdhiya iitaa oottana mala, Minaasee eta balettiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD spake by his servants the prophets, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hananabaa yootiya ba ashkkaratu baggaara hagaadan yaagiis;

English Sentences: Because Manasseh king of Judah hath done these abominations, and hath done wickedly above all that the Amorites did, which were before him, and hath made Judah also to sin with his idols:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Yihudaa Kawoi Minaasee ha tuna oosuwaa oottiis; baappe kase de7ida Amoore asaa ubbaa nagaraappekka aadhdhiya iitaa oottiis; Yihudaa asaa ba medhdhido eeqaa misiliyaayyo goinissidi, nagaraa ootissiis. I hegaa oottido gishshau,

English Sentences: Therefore thus saith the LORD God of Israel, Behold, I am bringing such evil upon Jerusalem and Judah, that whosoever heareth of it, both his ears shall tingle.
Wolaitta Sentences: taani GODAI Israa7eela Xoossai hagaadan yaagais; Siyiya asa ubbaa haittau iitiya bashshaa taani Yerusalaame bollinne Yihudaa bolli ehaana hanais.

English Sentences: And I will stretch over Jerusalem the line of Samaria, and the plummet of the house of Ahab: and I will wipe Jerusalem as a man wipeth a dish, wiping it, and turning it upside down.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani Samaariyaa bolli goochchido wodoruwaa, Yerusalaame bolli goochchana; Akaaba so asaa bolli yeddido tumbbiyaakka, Yerusalaame bolli yeddana. Issi asi keriyaa qucci gufanttidi melissiyoogaadan, taani Yerusalaame quccada gufanttana.

English Sentences: And I will forsake the remnant of mine inheritance, and deliver them into the hand of their enemies; and they shall become a prey and a spoil to all their enemies;
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta asaappe attidaageeta taani haassana; taani eta eta morkketu kushiyan aattada immana. Eta morkketi ubbai eta oiqqananne bonqqana.

English Sentences: Because they have done that which was evil in my sight, and have provoked me to anger, since the day their fathers came forth out of Egypt, even unto this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta maizza aawati Gibxxeppe kiyoosappe doommidi, hachchi gakkanaashin, eti ta sinttan iitabaa oottido gishshaunne tana hanqqetissido gishshau, taani hagaadan oottana yaagais" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Moreover Manasseh shed innocent blood very much, till he had filled Jerusalem from one end to another; beside his sin wherewith he made Judah to sin, in doing that which was evil in the sight of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Minaasee Yihudaa asaa GODAA sinttan nagaraa ootissidoogaa bollikka gujjidi, xillo asaa woriis; woridi Yerusalaamen ha gaxaappe ya gaxaa gakkanaashin, suuttaa kunttiis.

English Sentences: Now the rest of the acts of Manasseh, and all that he did, and his sin that he sinned, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Judah?
Wolaitta Sentences: Minaasee hanido harabai, i oottidobai ubbainne i oottido nagaraabai Yihudaa Kawotu Taarikiyaa Maxaafan xaafetti uttiis.

English Sentences: And Manasseh slept with his fathers, and was buried in the garden of his own house, in the garden of Uzza: and Amon his son reigned in his stead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Minaasee haiqqidi, ba maizzan gaittiis; yaanidi ba keettaa matan de7iya Uzza Ataakilttiyaa Sohuwaa giyoosan moogettiis. A sohuwan a na7ai Amooni kawotiis.

English Sentences: Amon was twenty and two years old when he began to reign, and he reigned two years in Jerusalem. And his mother's name was Meshullemeth, the daughter of Haruz of Jotbah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Amooni kawotiyo wode, laittai ayyo laatamanne naa77a; i Yerusalaamen naa77u laitta kawotiis. A aayee sunttai Mashulemeeto; a Yaaxiba kataman de7iya Haruuxa na7iyo.

English Sentences: And he did that which was evil in the sight of the LORD, as his father Manasseh did.
Wolaitta Sentences: A aawai Minaasee oottidoogaadan, Amoonikka GODAA sinttan iitabaa oottiis.

English Sentences: And he walked in all the way that his father walked in, and served the idols that his father served, and worshipped them:
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba aawai hemettido ogiyan ubban hemettiis; ba aawai oottido eeqatussi ikka oottiisinne etassi goinniis.

English Sentences: And he forsook the LORD God of his fathers, and walked not in the way of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA, ba maizza aawatu Xoossaa aggi bayiis; GODAA ogiyankka i hemettibeenna.

English Sentences: And the servants of Amon conspired against him, and slew the king in his own house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Amoona oosanchchati a bolli maqettidi, a kawo keettan a woridosona.

English Sentences: And the people of the land slew all them that had conspired against king Amon; and the people of the land made Josiah his son king in his stead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yihudaa asati Kawuwaa Amoona bolli maqettida ubbata woridosona. Woridi Amoona sohuwan a na7aa Yoosiyaasa kawoyidosona.

English Sentences: Now the rest of the acts of Amon which he did, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Judah?
Wolaitta Sentences: Amooni hanido harabainne i oottidobai ubbai Yihudaa Kawotu Taarikiyaa Maxaafan xaafetti uttiis.

English Sentences: And he was buried in his sepulchre in the garden of Uzza: and Josiah his son reigned in his stead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Amooni Uzza Ataakilttiyaa Sohuwaa giyoosan de7iya ba duufuwan moogettiis; a sohuwan a na7ai Yoosiyaasi kawotiis.

English Sentences: Josiah was eight years old when he began to reign, and he reigned thirty and one years in Jerusalem. And his mother's name was Jedidah, the daughter of Adaiah of Boscath.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yoosiyaasi kawotiyo wode, laittai ayyo hosppuna; i Yerusalaamen hasttamanne isiini laitta kawotiis. A aayee sunttai Yidiido; a Boxiqaata giyo kataman de7iya Adaaya na7iyo.

English Sentences: And he did that which was right in the sight of the LORD, and walked in all the way of David his father, and turned not aside to the right hand or to the left.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yoosiyaasi GODAA sinttan suurebaa oottiis; ushachchi haddirssi geennan ba maizza aawaa Daawita ogiyan ubban hemettiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass in the eighteenth year of king Josiah, that the king sent Shaphan the son of Azaliah, the son of Meshullam, the scribe, to the house of the LORD, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Yoosiyaasi ba kawotido tammanne hosppuntta laittan, Mashulaama na7aa na7aa, Axaaliyaa na7aa, waanna xaafiyaa Saafaana GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaa hagaadan yaagidi kiittiis;

English Sentences: Go up to Hilkiah the high priest, that he may sum the silver which is brought into the house of the LORD, which the keepers of the door have gathered of the people:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Asai Beeta Maqidasiyaa ehin, Beeta Maqidasiyaa penggiyaa naagiyaageeti asaappe shiishshido miishshaa qoodanaadan, qeese ubbatu halaqaa Hilqqiyaakko ba.

English Sentences: And let them deliver it into the hand of the doers of the work, that have the oversight of the house of the LORD: and let them give it to the doers of the work which is in the house of the LORD, to repair the breaches of the house,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qeese ubbatu halaqai miishshaa GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaa bottokonissiya halaqatussi sheedhdhana mala oda. Etikka Beeta Maqidasiyaa bottokoniya oosanchchatuyyo,

English Sentences: Unto carpenters, and builders, and masons, and to buy timber and hewn stone to repair the house.
Wolaitta Sentences: anaaxetuyyo gimbbiyaageetuyyoonne shuchchaa massiyaageetuyyo qanxxona. Qassi Beeta Maqidasiyaa bottokonanau, mittaanne qoo7ettida shuchchaa shammiyaageetuyyo qanxxona.

English Sentences: Howbeit there was no reckoning made with them of the money that was delivered into their hand, because they dealt faithfully.
Wolaitta Sentences: He oosuwaa wochchiyaageeti ammanettiya asa gidiyo gishshau, eta kushiyan gelida miishshan ai ai oottidaakko, eta oichchanau koshshenna" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Hilkiah the high priest said unto Shaphan the scribe, I have found the book of the law in the house of the LORD. And Hilkiah gave the book to Shaphan, and he read it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, qeese ubbatu halaqai Hilqqee waanna xaafiyaa Saafaana, "Higgiyaa Maxaafaa GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyan demmaas" yaagiis. Yaagidi maxaafaa Saafaanayyo immiis; immin Saafaani ekkidi nabbabiis.

English Sentences: And Shaphan the scribe came to the king, and brought the king word again, and said, Thy servants have gathered the money that was found in the house, and have delivered it into the hand of them that do the work, that have the oversight of the house of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Waanna xaafee Saafaani kawuwaakko simmidi biidi, "Beeta Maqidasiyan de7iya miishshaa ne oosanchchati wurssi ekkidi, Beeta Maqidasiyaa bottokonissiya halaqatuyyo immidosona" yaagidi yootiis.

English Sentences: And Shaphan the scribe shewed the king, saying, Hilkiah the priest hath delivered me a book. And Shaphan read it before the king.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka waanna xaafee Saafaani kawuwaa, "Qeesee Hilqqee taayyo maxaafaa immiis" yaagiis; yaagidi kawuwaa sinttan he maxaafaa nabbabiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, when the king had heard the words of the book of the law, that he rent his clothes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nabbabin Kawoi Higgiyaa Maxaafan de7iya qaalaa siyido wode, azzanidi ba maayuwaa pooshshiis.

English Sentences: And the king commanded Hilkiah the priest, and Ahikam the son of Shaphan, and Achbor the son of Michaiah, and Shaphan the scribe, and Asahiah a servant of the king's, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, kawoi qeesiyaa Hilqqiyaa, Saafaana na7aa Ahiqaama, Mikaaya na7aa Akiboora, waanna xaafiyaa Saafaananne kawuwaa oosanchchaa Asaaya hagaadan yaagidi azaziis;

English Sentences: Go ye, enquire of the LORD for me, and for the people, and for all Judah, concerning the words of this book that is found: for great is the wrath of the LORD that is kindled against us, because our fathers have not hearkened unto the words of this book, to do according unto all that which is written concerning us.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Biite; biidi ta gishshaa, ha asaa gishshaanne Yihudaa ubbaa gishshaa, ha beettida maxaafaa qaalaabaa ane GODAA oichchite. Aissi giikko, nuussi xaafettida ubbabaa oottanau, nu maizza aawati ha maxaafaa qaalaayyo azazettibeenna gishshau, nu bolli suullida GODAA hanqqoi keehippe daro" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So Hilkiah the priest, and Ahikam, and Achbor, and Shaphan, and Asahiah, went unto Huldah the prophetess, the wife of Shallum the son of Tikvah, the son of Harhas, keeper of the wardrobe; (now she dwelt in Jerusalem in the college;) and they communed with her.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin qeesee Hilqqee, Ahiqaami, Akiboori, Saafaaninne Asaayi hananabaa yootiya Hulddo giyo mishiriyo oichchanau biidosona. Huldda Harihaasa na7aa Tiiqiwa na7aa, Beeta Maqidasiyaa maayuwaa naagiya SHaaluuma maccaasiyo. A Yerusalaamen naa77antto shuchchan de7ausu. He biida asati iira haasayidosona.

English Sentences: And she said unto them, Thus saith the LORD God of Israel, Tell the man that sent you to me,
Wolaitta Sentences: Haasayin Huldda eta, "GODAI Israa7eela Xoossai, Inttena taakko kiittida bitaniyaayyo yootite yaagees.

English Sentences: Thus saith the LORD, Behold, I will bring evil upon this place, and upon the inhabitants thereof, even all the words of the book which the king of Judah hath read:
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; Be7ite, Yihudaa kawoi nabbabido maxaafan xaafettida iita qaalaa ubbaa taani ha sohuwaa bollinne ha sohuwan de7iya asaa bolli ehaana hanais.

English Sentences: Because they have forsaken me, and have burned incense unto other gods, that they might provoke me to anger with all the works of their hands; therefore my wrath shall be kindled against this place, and shall not be quenched.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti tana aggidi, hara xoossatuyyo ixaanaa cuwayidosona; yaatidi eti bantta kushiyan oottidoban ubban tana hanqqetissidosona. Hegaa gishshau, ta hanqqoi ha sohuwaa bolli eexxi kiyiis; to7anau danddayenna yaagees.

English Sentences: But to the king of Judah which sent you to enquire of the LORD, thus shall ye say to him, Thus saith the LORD God of Israel, As touching the words which thou hast heard;
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAA oichchanau inttena kiittida kawuwaa hagaadan yaagite; GODAI Israa7eela Xoossai neeni siyido qaalaabaa hagaadan yaagees;

English Sentences: Because thine heart was tender, and thou hast humbled thyself before the LORD, when thou heardest what I spake against this place, and against the inhabitants thereof, that they should become a desolation and a curse, and hast rent thy clothes, and wept before me; I also have heard thee, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani ha sohuwaa bollinne ha sohuwan de7iya asaa bolli, Taani inttena xaissananne baisa kessana gaada haasayidoogaa neeni siyido wode, ne wozanai shuggin, ta sinttan ne huuphiyaa kaushshido gishshaunne ne maayuwaa pooshshada, ta sinttan yeekkido gishshau, taani ne woosaa siyaas.

English Sentences: Behold therefore, I will gather thee unto thy fathers, and thou shalt be gathered into thy grave in peace; and thine eyes shall not see all the evil which I will bring upon this place. And they brought the king word again.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, taani nena saruwan ne maizzan gattana; neeni saro moogettana. Taani ha sohuwaa bollinne ha sohuwan de7iya asaa bolli ehaana iitabaa ne aifee be7enna" yaagees yaagite" yaagaasu. Yaagin eti biidi, ha haasayettidabaa kawuwaayyo yootidosona.

English Sentences: And the king sent, and they gathered unto him all the elders of Judah and of Jerusalem.
